data.text:
Trainer-san. ……sorry for taking so long. 
About my next race――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san. ……sorry for taking so long. 
<story>About my next race――

data.text:
My goal is to take first place in the 『NHK Mile Cup』! 
I look forward to your guidance!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>My goal is to take first place in the 『NHK Mile Cup』! 
<story>I look forward to your guidance!!

data.text:
Yes. I thought there was something that I could show them, 
that these legs could leave behind.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yes. I thought there was something that I could show them, 
<story>that these legs could leave behind.

data.text:
Since Trainer-san and everyone else believes in my speed…… 
I will definitely win the title of 『Generation's Fastest』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Since Trainer-san and everyone else believes in my speed…… 
<story>I will definitely win the title of 『Generation's Fastest』!

data.text:
Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
<story>You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!

data.text:
Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. ……『Strong Uma Musume are Strong』. 
<story>You'll prove that in your own way, in a way that only you can!

data.text:
……I see. So you've decided too. 
……Alright, now that we've decided that, time's running out!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……I see. So you've decided too. 
<story>……Alright, now that we've decided that, time's running out!

data.text:
Something that nobody has achieved before. Obtaining the 
unorthodox double crown of the 『Oka Sho』 and 『NHK Mile C』. 
We need to make sure to train and prepare properly!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Something that nobody has achieved before. Obtaining the 
<story>unorthodox double crown of the 『Oka Sho』 and 『NHK Mile C』. 
<story>We need to make sure to train and prepare properly!

data.text: And with that said――!
data.processed: <story>And with that said――!

data.text:
Uwaah~, so we're doing training camp here, huh!? 
Ufufu, being completely surrounded by the forest 
like this, I'll be able to sleep reeeeally well~.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Uwaah~, so we're doing training camp here, huh!? 
<story>Ufufu, being completely surrounded by the forest 
<story>like this, I'll be able to sleep reeeeally well~.

data.text:
Idiot! You're an idiot! We're here for training camp, 
you know!? Especially for those two in the Classic 
class! They need to really train up after all!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Idiot! You're an idiot! We're here for training camp, 
<story>you know!? Especially for those two in the Classic 
<story>class! They need to really train up after all!

data.text:
Trainer-san, King-san, thank you for the wonderful 
suggestion! I'm going to put my luggage away and 
get changed, okay? Let's get started soon!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, King-san, thank you for the wonderful 
<story>suggestion! I'm going to put my luggage away and 
<story>get changed, okay? Let's get started soon!

data.text:
And so, surrounded by forests, mountains, 
and nature, the days of intense training began……!
data.processed:
<story>And so, surrounded by forests, mountains, 
<story>and nature, the days of intense training began……!

data.text:
Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
<story>place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?

data.text:
Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft! There's a steep hill nearby. It might be a good 
<story>place to work on dashing. Want to go check it out later?

data.text:
Waaah……! Thank you very much! 
Please add it to the menu!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Waaah……! Thank you very much! 
<story>Please add it to the menu!

data.text:
And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
we're going to focusing on stamina training.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
<story>we're going to focusing on stamina training.

data.text:
And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
we're going to focusing on stamina training.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And, Cesario. In preparation for the 『Oaks』 
<story>we're going to focusing on stamina training.

data.text:
I understand. 
By all means, thank you for your consideration.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I understand. 
<story>By all means, thank you for your consideration.

data.text:
Uhii-, the classic crew has it rough……!! 
But, seeing them work so hard nearby, gets me motivated!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Uhii-, the classic crew has it rough……!! 
<story>But, seeing them work so hard nearby, gets me motivated!

data.text:
Well, I guess it makes you think you should work hard too…… 
Nnnnnnaa~~, I guess we should do another lap, huh!?
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Well, I guess it makes you think you should work hard too…… 
<story>Nnnnnnaa~~, I guess we should do another lap, huh!?

data.text:
Fufuu……isn't this fine? 
Looks like this training camp will be worthwhile!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu……isn't this fine? 
<story>Looks like this training camp will be worthwhile!

data.text:
We worked hard from early in the morning until sunset. 
The Classic class was working hard to prepare for this 
once-in-a-lifetime event, so they wouldn't have any regrets.
data.processed:
<story>We worked hard from early in the morning until sunset. 
<story>The Classic class was working hard to prepare for this 
<story>once-in-a-lifetime event, so they wouldn't have any regrets.

data.text: And then, after all that hard training――
data.processed: <story>And then, after all that hard training――

data.text:
Fuuuu……the fire for this grill has also been lit. It's ready to 
be used so go ahead and arrange the vegetables as you like.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fuuuu……the fire for this grill has also been lit. It's ready to 
<story>be used so go ahead and arrange the vegetables as you like.

data.text:
Amazing~……You really are reliable and 
efficient when your switch is on, Cesario……!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Amazing~……You really are reliable and 
<story>efficient when your switch is on, Cesario……!

data.text:
Yeah, yeah……but, Cesario, are you properly eating too? 
You don't have to keep looking after all of us you know~.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah……but, Cesario, are you properly eating too? 
<story>You don't have to keep looking after all of us you know~.

data.text:
They're right, Cesario-san. 
Nutrition is quite important for building up your body after all!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>They're right, Cesario-san. 
<story>Nutrition is quite important for building up your body after all!

data.text:
That's right! That big carrot wrapped in foil that we 
grilled is almost ready isn't it? I'll go get it!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That's right! That big carrot wrapped in foil that we 
<story>grilled is almost ready isn't it? I'll go get it!

data.text:
Fufu, thank you. But, I'll go cut it, so do you want to 
split it? Kraft, you'd probably burn yourself after all.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, thank you. But, I'll go cut it, so do you want to 
<story>split it? Kraft, you'd probably burn yourself after all.

data.text: Ehh!? Aren't you treating me too much like a kid!? C'mon-……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Ehh!? Aren't you treating me too much like a kid!? C'mon-……!

data.text:
Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
Think it's about time I started peeling them?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
<story>Think it's about time I started peeling them?

data.text:
Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
Think it's about time I started peeling them?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Heeey, everyone! I bought a bunch of apples for dessert. 
<story>Think it's about time I started peeling them?

data.text: Oh, how thoughtful!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Oh, how thoughtful!

data.text:
Trainer……are you gonna be okay? 
It'd be bad if you cut yourself, should I peel them instead?
data.name: Cesario

choices.text: Huh? Now I'm treated like a kid too!?
Huh? Now I'm treated like a kid too!?

data.processed:
<story>Trainer……are you gonna be okay? 
<story>It'd be bad if you cut yourself, should I peel them instead?

data.text:
Ahahaha! 
Trainer-san, you're just like me now, huh?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaha! 
<story>Trainer-san, you're just like me now, huh?

data.text:
The team's cheerful laughter filled the air. 
After exhausting themselves with intense training, 
it was time to replenish those lost nutrients――
data.processed:
<story>The team's cheerful laughter filled the air. 
<story>After exhausting themselves with intense training, 
<story>it was time to replenish those lost nutrients――

data.text:
And then tomorrow, they'd resume their intense 
training, aiming for victory. And that's how 
they spent the rest of training camp――
data.processed:
<story>And then tomorrow, they'd resume their intense 
<story>training, aiming for victory. And that's how 
<story>they spent the rest of training camp――

data.text:
Haaa, I'm exhausted today too~……! 
I guess the training camp is coming to an end soon, huh?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haaa, I'm exhausted today too~……! 
<story>I guess the training camp is coming to an end soon, huh?

data.text:
Yeah……but I do feel like I've made good progress towards the 
『Oaks』. It feels like my stamina has improved quite a lot.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……but I do feel like I've made good progress towards the 
<story>『Oaks』. It feels like my stamina has improved quite a lot.

data.text:
Me too! Since I've been working on improving my 
dash strength, I feel like my starts are getting 
much smoother and I'm able to pull ahead easier.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Me too! Since I've been working on improving my 
<story>dash strength, I feel like my starts are getting 
<story>much smoother and I'm able to pull ahead easier.

data.text:
Yeah――It's good. I feel the difference. I think I'm 
all set, in regards to winning at the 『NHK Mile C』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah――It's good. I feel the difference. I think I'm 
<story>all set, in regards to winning at the 『NHK Mile C』!

data.text:
……I wonder if there's anyone watching me. If I'll be able to…… 
leave something behind. ……I want to leave something behind.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I wonder if there's anyone watching me. If I'll be able to…… 
<story>leave something behind. ……I want to leave something behind.

data.text: ――Hey, you know how they say 『It kind of feels like fate』?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>――Hey, you know how they say 『It kind of feels like fate』?

data.text:
Yeah……do you think it's something unique to Uma Musume? 
But, I know what you mean. I can't really put it in 
words though……kind of like how I feel with Spe-san.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Yeah……do you think it's something unique to Uma Musume? 
<story>But, I know what you mean. I can't really put it in 
<story>words though……kind of like how I feel with Spe-san.

data.text:
Right! Kind of like some mysterious force pulling 
on you……or leading you. Like when you're with 
them, you feel this warm light in your chest.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Right! Kind of like some mysterious force pulling 
<story>on you……or leading you. Like when you're with 
<story>them, you feel this warm light in your chest.

data.text: To become that 『Something』 for someone. That's what I want too.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>To become that 『Something』 for someone. That's what I want too.

data.text:
To have someone feel that kind of fate with 
you……huh. You're right, that dream you've 
always been talking about is a bit like that.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>To have someone feel that kind of fate with 
<story>you……huh. You're right, that dream you've 
<story>always been talking about is a bit like that.

data.text:
Yeah! If my running can make someone feel some kind of fate……
if my aspiration becomes that link for someone, it would be nice.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! If my running can make someone feel some kind of fate……
<story>if my aspiration becomes that link for someone, it would be nice.

data.text:
……Cesario. 
I'm going to win the 『NHK Mile C』
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……Cesario. 
<story>I'm going to win the 『NHK Mile C』

data.text:
……Yeah. 
Someone will definitely be watching you.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……Yeah. 
<story>Someone will definitely be watching you.

data.text:
……Alright, we have an early morning tomorrow so we should get to 
bed. Let's get a good rest and work hard again tomorrow, Kraft.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……Alright, we have an early morning tomorrow so we should get to 
<story>bed. Let's get a good rest and work hard again tomorrow, Kraft.

data.text: Yeah. Good night, Cesario!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Yeah. Good night, Cesario!

data.text:
(I'll keep doing my best, and run. So I can leave something 
behind. ……I'll definitely leave something behind)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(I'll keep doing my best, and run. So I can leave something 
<story>behind. ……I'll definitely leave something behind)

data.text: (My heritage, without a doubt)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>(My heritage, without a doubt)
